snippet: The number of dead pigs found floating in a river flowing into Shanghai has reached nearly 6,000.
abstract: Shanghai government says that number of dead pigs found floating in river flowing into city has reached nearly 6,000 but that city water remains safe; surge in dumping of dead pigs, believed to be from farms upriver in Zhejiang Province, follows police campaigns to curb illicit trade of pork products harvested from diseased pigs.
lead_paragraph: The number of dead pigs found floating in a river flowing into Shanghai has reached nearly 6,000.

headline.main: China: Dead Pigs in River Near 6,000
headline.print_headline: China: Dead Pigs in River Near 6,000
